author: USA TODAY
title: Steph Curry destroys defender’s ankles
text:
Steph Curry destroys defender’s ankles Steph Curry embarrassed Marvin Williams. Post to Facebook Steph Curry destroys defender’s ankles Steph Curry embarrassed Marvin Williams.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/warriors-steph-curry-marvin-williams-ankles-crossover-broken-bench-reaction/   Join the Nation's Conversation   Steph Curry destroys defender’s ankles Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 12:12 a.m. ET Feb. 2, 2017 
Marvin Williams wasn't ready. (Photo: NBA) 
Steph Curry was on fire in the first half of the Warriors' game against the Hornets on Wednesday night, and the bench absolutely loved it. Curry scored 26 points (8/10 from deep!!!) and seven assists as Golden State took a commanding 77-56 at the HALF. 
While Curry got open to drain one of his threes late in the second quarter, Charlotte's Marvin Williams got a crossed up. Steph Curry put Marvin Williams on skates, nails shot, bench goes off pic.twitter.com/NzFGByK5KA — CJ Fogler (@cjzero) February 2, 2017 
Williams did try really hard to contest Curry's shot, though he looked a little foolish in the process - with his hand stretched out as he toppled over. 
Now, watch it again and pay attention to the bench. Some of them fell out of their seats and onto the floor. 
The Warriors bench can barely handle how hot Curry is. Steph is on fire and the Warriors bench has zero chill pic.twitter.com/I8miicexVS — CJ Fogler (@cjzero) February 2, 2017 Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/warriors-steph-curry-marvin-williams-ankles-crossover-broken-bench-reaction/ Most Popular
